com.pokerface.pokerapi.users

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokerface.pokerapi.users.UserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService

    @Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    UserService operates with the UserController. UserController receives messages from users and maps those to UserService methods in order to apply the logic and changes required to the UserRepository. UserRepository exists within UserService, it is used to save, and pull users as needed by the UserController.
